## Overview



## Installation

Install the development version of `biodivercity` from GitHub:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("ecological-cities/biodivercity", ref = "main")
```

## Setup

Load the package:

```{r eval = FALSE}
library(biodivercity)
```

```{r include = FALSE, eval = FALSE}
devtools::load_all() # to knit manually w latest changes (not built/installed yet)
# vignette will be checked in R-CMD check & package build (should use library(home2park))
```
